verses.verse: וַיֵּצְאוּ֮ <WH3318> went out כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> Then all the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> of Israel וַתִּקָּהֵ֨ל <WH6950> was gathered together הָעֵדָ֜ה <WH5712> and the congregation כְּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man אֶחָ֗ד <WH259> as one לְמִדָּן֙ <WH1835> from Dan וְעַד־ <WH5704> against בְּאֵ֣ר שֶׁ֔בַע <WH884> even to Beersheba וְאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> with the land הַגִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> of Gilead אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD הַמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <WH4709> in Mizpeh

וַיִּֽתְיַצְּב֞וּ <WH3320> presented פִּנּ֣וֹת <WH6438> And the chief כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> of all the people כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> [even] of all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בִּקְהַ֖ל <WH6951> themselves in the assembly עַ֣ם <WH5971> of the people הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God אַרְבַּ֨ע <WH702> four מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> thousand אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> soldiers רַגְלִ֖י <WH7273> foot שֹׁ֥לֵֽף <WH8025> that drew חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> sword פ

וַֽיִּשְׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> heard בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> (Now the children בִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> of Benjamin כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָל֥וּ <WH5927> were gone up בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> that the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel הַמִּצְפָּ֑ה <WH4709> Mitspah וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> said בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel דַּבְּר֕וּ <WH1696> Tell אֵיכָ֥ה <WH349> how נִהְיְתָ֖ה <WH1961> [us] how was הָרָעָ֥ה <WH7451> adversity הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

וַיַּ֜עַן <WH6030> answered הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> the husband הַלֵּוִ֗י <WH3881> the Levite אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> the husband הָאִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> of the woman הַנִּרְצָחָ֖ה <WH7523> that was slain וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said הַגִּבְעָ֙תָה֙ <WH1390> into Gibeah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לְבִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> that [belongeth] to Benjamin בָּ֛אתִי <WH935> I came אֲנִ֥י <WH589> my וּפִֽילַגְשִׁ֖י <WH6370> I and my concubine לָלֽוּן׃ <WH3885> to lodge

וַיָּקֻ֤מוּ <WH6965> rose עָלַי֙ <WH5921> against בַּעֲלֵ֣י <WH1167> And the men הַגִּבְעָ֔ה <WH1390> of Gibeah וַיָּסֹ֧בּוּ <WH5437> round about עָלַ֛י <WH5921> because אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> the house לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> upon me by night אוֹתִי֙ <WH853> דִּמּ֣וּ <WH1819> [and] thought לַהֲרֹ֔ג <WH2026> to have slain וְאֶת־ <WH853> פִּילַגְשִׁ֥י <WH6370> me and my concubine עִנּ֖וּ <WH6031> have they forced וַתָּמֹֽת׃ <WH4191> that she is dead

וָֽאֹחֵ֤ז <WH270> And I took בְּפִֽילַגְשִׁי֙ <WH6370> my concubine וָֽאֲנַתְּחֶ֔הָ <WH5408> and cut her in pieces וָֽאֲשַׁלְּחֶ֔הָ <WH7971> and sent בְּכָל־ <WH3605> her throughout שְׂדֵ֖ה <WH7704> her throughout all the country נַחֲלַ֣ת <WH5159> of the inheritance יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel כִּ֥י <WH3588> for עָשׂ֛וּ <WH6213> for they have committed זִמָּ֥ה <WH2154> lewdness וּנְבָלָ֖ה <WH5039> and folly בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> in Israel

הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold כֻלְּכֶ֖ם <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> Behold ye [are] all children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel הָב֥וּ <WH3051> give לָכֶ֛ם דָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> your advice וְעֵצָ֖ה <WH6098> and counsel הֲלֹֽם׃ <WH1988> here

וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <WH6965> arose כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> And all the people כְּאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> as one לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying לֹ֤א <WH3808> nor נֵלֵךְ֙ <WH1980> will go אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> We will not any לְאָהֳל֔וֹ <WH168> to his tent וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor נָס֖וּר <WH5493> [of us] turn אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> neither will we any לְבֵיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> into his house

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> now זֶ֣ה <WH2088> this הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> But now this [shall be] the thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> which we will do לַגִּבְעָ֑ה <WH1390> to Gibeah עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> against בְּגוֹרָֽל׃ <WH1486> [we will go up] by lot

וְלָקַ֣חְנוּ <WH3947> And we will take עֲשָׂרָה֩ <WH6235> ten אֲנָשִׁ֨ים <WH376> of an לַמֵּאָ֜ה <WH3967> of an hundred לְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> for all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> throughout all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וּמֵאָ֤ה <WH3967> and an hundred לָאֶ֙לֶף֙ <WH505> of a thousand וְאֶ֣לֶף <WH505> and a thousand לָרְבָבָ֔ה <WH7233> out of ten thousand לָקַ֥חַת <WH3947> to fetch צֵדָ֖ה <WH6720> victual לָעָ֑ם <WH5971> for the people לַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <WH6213> that they may do לְבוֹאָם֙ <WH935> when they come לְגֶ֣בַע <WH1387> to Gibeah בִּנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> of Benjamin כְּכָל־ <WH3605> for all הַ֨נְּבָלָ֔ה <WH5039> according to all the folly אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> they עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> that they have wrought בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> in Israel

וַיֵּֽאָסֵ֞ף <WH622> were gathered כָּל־ <WH3605> all אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> So all the men יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> against הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> against the city כְּאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> as one חֲבֵרִֽים׃ <WH2270> knit together פ

וַֽיִּשְׁלְח֞וּ <WH7971> sent שִׁבְטֵ֤י <WH7626> And the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH582> men בְּכָל־ <WH3605> the entire שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> through all the tribe בִנְיָמִ֖ן <WH1144> of Benjamin לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying מָ֚ה <WH4100> What הָרָעָ֣ה <WH7451> What wickedness הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that נִהְיְתָ֖ה <WH1961> [is] this that is done בָּכֶֽם׃

וְעַתָּ֡ה <WH6258> Now תְּנוּ֩ <WH5414> Now therefore deliver אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲנָשִׁ֨ים <WH376> the men בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children בְלִיַּ֜עַל <WH1100> of Belial אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after בַּגִּבְעָה֙ <WH1390> which [are] in Gibeah וּנְמִיתֵ֔ם <WH4191> that we may put them to death וּנְבַעֲרָ֥ה <WH1197> and put away רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> evil מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> from Israel וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not אָבוּ֙ <WH14> would (בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the sons ק) בִּנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> of Benjamin לִשְׁמֹ֕עַ <WH8085> not hearken בְּק֖וֹל <WH6963> to the voice אֲחֵיהֶ֥ם <WH251> of their brethren בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> But the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיֵּאָסְפ֧וּ <WH622> gathered themselves together בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> But the children בִנְיָמִ֛ן <WH1144> of Benjamin מִן־ <WH4480> from הֶעָרִ֖ים <WH5892> out of the cities הַגִּבְעָ֑תָה <WH1390> unto Gibeah לָצֵ֥את <WH3318> to go out לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> to battle עִם־ <WH5973> against בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> against the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיִּתְפָּֽקְדוּ֩ <WH6485> were numbered בְנֵ֨י <WH1121> And the children בִנְיָמִ֜ן <WH1144> of Benjamin בַּיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> at that time הַהוּא֙ <WH1931> he מֵהֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> out of the cities עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> twenty וְשִׁשָּׁ֥ה <WH8337> and six אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> thousand אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> men שֹׁ֣לֵֽף <WH8025> that drew חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> sword לְ֠בַד <WH905> beside מִיֹּשְׁבֵ֤י <WH3427> beside the inhabitants הַגִּבְעָה֙ <WH1390> of Gibeah הִתְפָּ֣קְד֔וּ <WH6485> which were numbered שְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> men בָּחֽוּר׃ <WH970> young

מִכֹּ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> each הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> Among all this people הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> one שְׁבַ֤ע <WH7651> [there were] seven מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> hundred אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> men בָּח֔וּר <WH970> young אִטֵּ֖ר <WH334> left יַד־ <WH3027> able יְמִינ֑וֹ <WH3225> left-handed כָּל־ <WH3605> each זֶ֗ה <WH2088> one קֹלֵ֧עַ <WH7049> every one could sling בָּאֶ֛בֶן <WH68> stones אֶל־ <WH413> at הַֽשַּׂעֲרָ֖ה <WH8185> at an hair וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and not יַחֲטִֽא׃ <WH2398> [breadth] and not miss פ

וְאִ֨ישׁ <WH376> And the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel הִתְפָּֽקְד֗וּ <WH6485> were numbered לְבַד֙ <WH905> beside מִבִּנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> beside Benjamin אַרְבַּ֨ע <WH702> four מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> thousand אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> men שֹׁ֣לֵֽף <WH8025> that drew חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> sword כָּל־ <WH3605> all זֶ֖ה <WH2088> these אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> all these [were] men מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> of war

וַיָּקֻ֜מוּ <WH6965> arose וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <WH5927> and went up בֵֽית־ אֵל֮ <WH1008> to Bethel וַיִּשְׁאֲל֣וּ <WH7592> and asked בֵאלֹהִים֒ <WH430> counsel of God וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> and said בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel מִ֚י <WH4310> Which יַעֲלֶה־ <WH5927> of us shall go up לָּ֣נוּ בַתְּחִלָּ֔ה <WH8462> first לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> to the battle עִם־ <WH5973> against בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> against the children בִנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> Benjamin וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Jehovah יְהוּדָ֥ה <WH3063> Judah בַתְּחִלָּֽה׃ <WH8462> [shall go up] first

וַיָּק֥וּמוּ <WH6965> rose up בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַיַּֽחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and encamped עַל־ <WH5921> against הַגִּבְעָֽה׃ <WH1390> against Gibeah פ

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <WH3318> went out אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> And the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> to battle עִם־ <WH5973> against בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> against Benjamin וַיַּעַרְכ֨וּ <WH6186> put themselves in array אִתָּ֧ם <WH853> אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> and the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel מִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> to fight אֶל־ <WH413> at הַגִּבְעָֽה׃ <WH1390> against them at Gibeah

וַיֵּצְא֥וּ <WH3318> came forth בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children בִנְיָמִ֖ן <WH1144> of Benjamin מִן־ <WH4480> out הַגִּבְעָ֑ה <WH1390> out of Gibeah וַיַּשְׁחִ֨יתוּ <WH7843> and destroyed down בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of the Israelites בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he שְׁנַ֨יִם <WH8147> and two וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> thousand אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> men אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> to the ground

וַיִּתְחַזֵּ֥ק <WH2388> encouraged הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And the people אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיֹּסִ֙פוּ֙ <WH3254> again לַעֲרֹ֣ךְ <WH6186> in array מִלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> themselves and set their battle בַּמָּק֕וֹם <WH4725> in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> they עָ֥רְכוּ <WH6186> where they put themselves in array שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> in it בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הָרִאשֽׁוֹן׃ <WH7223> the first

וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <WH5927> went up בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> (And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּבְכּ֣וּ <WH1058> and wept לִפְנֵֽי־ <WH6440> before יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> the LORD עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעֶרֶב֒ <WH6153> until even וַיִּשְׁאֲל֤וּ <WH7592> and asked בַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> counsel of the LORD לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying הַאוֹסִ֗יף <WH3254> again לָגֶ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH5066> Shall I go up לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> to battle עִם־ <WH5973> against בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> against the children בִנְיָמִ֖ן <WH1144> of Benjamin אָחִ֑י <WH251> of my brother וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD עֲל֥וּ <WH5927> Go up אֵלָֽיו׃ <WH413> against פ
